sentences.en: At the big ramshackle Baffles Hotel Rule dropped their bags.

sentences.en: The appropriate out - of - controlness started on a ramshackle ranch near Santa Fe, New Mexico.

sentences.en: The rendezvous is set for a ramshackle building a potholed road on the outskirts of Blagoveschensk.

sentences.en: These ramshackle buildings have fallen down.
They entered the shop, which was a curious ramshackle building.
sentences.cn: 他们进了商店，那是幢年久失修的奇特建筑。
